sentences.en: An old pal is bringing me a two - carat hunk of ice.
sentences.cn: 一位老朋友要带给我一颗两克拉重的钻石.

sentences.en: Bracelets has a round hunk of synthetic silicon rubber stamped with the couragous phrase.
sentences.cn: 手环是用合成硅橡胶上写的一些励志词语的大圆环.

sentences.en: But this hunk is the strong and handsome Russell Crowe.
sentences.cn: 但是,她的新男友是健壮英俊的拉塞尔·克罗.

sentences.en: Gordon: I was just watching a movie by Hollywood's hunk.
sentences.cn: 戈登: 我想去看场由好莱坞最棒的男影星主演的电影.

sentences.en: Gordon: I wore a tuxedo to my brother's wedding. Do you think I am a hunk?
sentences.cn: 戈登: 我就是穿黑色无尾礼服去参加哥哥的婚礼的, 你觉得我帅 吗 ?

sentences.en: Its a prime hunk of real estate.
sentences.cn: 这是真实时期主要的一大块.

sentences.en: Jack: You must mean, Dustin Hoffan, he is a hunk!
sentences.cn: 杰克: 你肯定说的是达斯汀·霍夫曼, 他可是个明星啊!

sentences.en: Jacky Chan is a hunk, so is Stallone!
sentences.cn: 成龙是个超级明星, 史泰隆也是.

sentences.en: Lish: What's that hunk of steel you are carrying?
sentences.cn: 丽斯: 你提的那么一大块破铜烂铁是什么玩意?

sentences.en: Molly: I wonder what my hunk, AKA Brad Pitt, will wear.
sentences.cn: 莫莉: 我想知道我的偶像, 也就是布莱德·彼得穿什么.

sentences.en: New Hunk boyfriend: Russell Crowe - star of Gladiator.
sentences.cn: 新男友: 拉塞尔·罗,《角斗士》中的明星.

sentences.en: On top of the ramekin a skinless half chicken or a hunk of lean pork shoulder.
sentences.cn: 烤碗上搁半只去皮鸡或一大块精猪腿肉.

sentences.en: She tore off a large hunk of bread.
The Hollywood hunk adopted two children with ex - wife Nicole Kidman.
sentences.cn: 克鲁斯在与妮可·德曼的那段婚姻中就收养了两个孩子.

sentences.en: The Hollywood hunk, 43 , was picked by more than one in four blokes.
sentences.cn: 这个43岁的好莱坞魅力男人得到了超过25%的投票.

trans.tran_en: a thick piece of something, especially food, that has been taken from a bigger piece
